title: build environment executor
description: builds the environment variables to be used based on cdk outputs

pathToCdkOutputs.description: (root relative) path to outputfile produced by cdk deploy -O

cdkOutputsFileName.description: denotes name of file produced by cdk deploy -O

gitBranchToCorrespondingStackName.description: object representing a map of {[key: gitBranch]: stackName}

whichBuilder.description: string used to select which builder file should be used
